column4: hey, i got ubuntu amd64 installed, but, it refuses to let me bring up X
i get (EE) No devices detected. fatal error: no screens found
is there any text based web client that comes with default ubuntu?
my gfx card is at PCI:5:0:0 (pci-e), is that any sort of problem?
are you useing dhcp?  if so try useing static
And what video card do you have ?
i cant remember how to set gateway and dns in linux
refuses to let me write to it
is ur hard drive mounted read-only ?
hmm let me look up the command hold on.
